scripts.move:components:min: for f in .tmp/components/*.css; do base=$(basename "$f" .css); mv "$f" "dist/components/${base}.min.css"; mv "${f}.map" "dist/components/${base}.min.css.map"; done
scripts.move:themes:min: for f in .tmp/themes/*.css; do base=$(basename "$f" .css); mv "$f" "dist/themes/${base}.min.css"; mv "${f}.map" "dist/themes/${base}.min.css.map"; done
scripts.build:css: npm run build:vds && npm run build:core && npm run build:identity && npm run build:components && npm run build:themes
scripts.build:css:min: npm run build:vds:min && npm run build:core:min && npm run build:identity:min && npm run build:components:min:tmp && npm run move:components:min && npm run build:themes:min:tmp && npm run move:themes:min
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:css && npm run build:css:min && rimraf .tmp
